message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $180 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $130 for the product.  Let's see if we can make a deal.
Hi Bob, I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm still willing to work with you. I can offer you a better deal. I'll sell the product to you for $160.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $160 is still a bit high for me. I'm firm on my previous offer of $130. If you're willing to accept that, we can close the deal.
Hi Bob, I understand you're firm on your offer, but I'm still not willing to sell at $130. I'll meet you halfway and offer you the product for $145.
Alice, I'm getting closer to your price, but I can't go any higher than $140. This is my final offer. Let me know if you're willing to accept.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still not willing to sell at $140. I'll make one more offer: I'll sell the product to you for $150, but that's my final offer.
